profile:
Bath Planet of Ottawa has been a trusted bathroom remodelling company since 1999 and our remodelling services have earned a reputation for being efficient, beautiful, and affordable. We offer a wide range of products--from beautiful single-threshold showers to comfortable and secure walk-in bathtubs--that are designed with your needs in mind. When you choose Bath Planet of Ottawa to complete your renovation project, you can be sure that your bathroom will look beautiful for years to come.

Our bathroom solutions are constructed from the highest-quality acrylic materials from Bath Planet. Acrylic is incredibly durable, easy to clean, and naturally resists mold, mildew, cracking, and fading, so your bathroom will be incredibly easy to maintain. Even better, you can choose from a wide range of customization options to ensure that your new bathroom shows off your personal style. With your choice of color, pattern, accessories, and hardware, our Ottawa remodelers will bring your vision to life.

We are committed to providing beautiful bathrooms that our clients will enjoy for years to come and we go above and beyond to accomplish this goal. Whether you need a simple cosmetic upgrade or you’d like to outfit your entire bathroom with ADA-compliant products, we will work closely with you to understand your needs and create the perfect solution for you.

If you’re ready to start planning the bathroom of your dreams, the experts at Bath Planet of Ottawa have what it takes to complete your renovation efficiently and affordably. Get in touch with us today to request your free Ottawa bathroom remodeling estimate!
